name: Aggressive Tears
description:
Aggressive Tears

Topdown 2D boss battle game. The game is about a fighter (Tears) fight bosses with any item available. Combine item to make it more effective against the enemy.

Controls

Left mouse button = attack

WASD = movement or inventory navigation

Tab/E = Open/Close inventory

1/2/3 = Combine items
